author: Mike Rivero
title: What Virus? Military Asks Whopping $20B To ‘Deter Chinese Aggression’
description: The U.S. Indo-Pacific Command submitted a $20 billion wish list to Congress requesting a billion dollars for stockpiles of long-range weapons, millions in new military funding for partner nations, and a $1.6 billion defensive ring around Guam in order to dete…
content: The 2020 National Defense Authorization Act required U.S. Indo-Pacific Command head Adm. Phil Davidson to submit a report to Congress by March 15, 2020 detailing what the command needs to fulfill the National Defense Strategy and maintain an edge over China. … [+3904 chars]
